column4: hello everyone i just installed ubuntu and i am trying to configure a dual monitor setup with an nvidia graphics card, right now it just apears as a clone and i am unable to drag a window from one monitor to the other, any help anyone?
good luck, that's one of the tougher things to do in Linux.  It took me 2 solid weeks with my ATI setup, but that's with a tough situation.  Have you tried using Envy?
I have no experience with nVidia, I use ATI, unfortunately.  anyone with nVidia experience?
again good luck, I've gotta eat
